entry.title: A mining pool at 46%
entry.summary: In an email conversation on April 5th, 2013, regarding the risks of double spending within blockchain technology, Melvin Carvalho added that there are other risks to consider. Specifically, he questioned how difficult it would be to undo vandalism to the chain, which could be caused by deliberately triggering bugs or inserting illegal data into the chain. The email conversation also highlighted the need to address vulnerabilities in the underlying technology and make it expensive for attackers to engage in malicious behavior.
